original_text: Though, in this Letter we have constructed the Born–Infeld black holes in the presence of a cosmological constant and discussed their thermodynamical properties, many issues however still remain to be investigated. We know that Reissner–Nordström AdS black holes undergo Hawking–Page phase transition. This transition gets modified as we include Born–Infeld corrections into account. We hope to carry out a detail study on this issue in the future. Furthermore, in the context of brane world cosmology, it was found that a brane moving in a Reissner–Nordström AdS background generates non-singular cosmology [14]. However, as shown in [15], the brane always crosses the inner horizon of the bulk geometry, creating an instability. It would be interesting to study cosmology on the brane when it is moving in the charged black hole backgrounds that we have constructed. Note that since these charged holes does not have inner horizon for certain range of parameters, we may generate non-singular cosmology without creating the instabilities that we have just mentioned.
original_translation: Aunque en esta carta hemos construido los agujeros negros de Born-Infeld en presencia de una constante cosmológica y discutido sus propiedades termodinámicas, aún quedan muchos problemas por investigar. Sabemos que los agujeros negros de Reissner-Nordström AdS experimentan una transición de fase de Hawking-Page. Esta transición se modifica al incluir las correcciones de Born-Infeld. Esperamos llevar a cabo un estudio detallado sobre este tema en el futuro. Además, en el contexto de la cosmología del mundo de branas, se encontró que una brana en movimiento en un fondo de Reissner-Nordström AdS genera una cosmología no singular [14]. Sin embargo, como se muestra en [15], la brana siempre cruza el horizonte interno de la geometría a granel, creando una inestabilidad. Sería interesante estudiar la cosmología en la brana cuando se mueve en los fondos de agujeros negros cargados que hemos construido. Nótese que dado que estos agujeros cargados no tienen horizonte interno para cierto rango de parámetros, podríamos generar una cosmología no singular sin crear las inestabilidades que acabamos de mencionar.

This transition gets modified as we include Born–Infeld corrections into account.
We hope to carry out a detail study on this issue in the future.
Furthermore, in the context of brane world cosmology, it was found that a brane moving in a Reissner–Nordström AdS background generates non-singular cosmology [14].
However, as shown in [15], the brane always crosses the inner horizon of the bulk geometry, creating an instability.
It would be interesting to study cosmology on the brane when it is moving in the charged black hole backgrounds that we have constructed.
Note that since these charged holes does not have inner horizon for certain range of parameters, we may generate non-singular cosmology without creating the instabilities that we have just mentioned.

It would be interesting to study cosmology on the brane when it is moving in the charged black hole backgrounds that we have constructed.

discussed their thermodynamical properties

We hope to carry out a detail study on this issue in the future.

However, as shown in [15], the brane always crosses the inner horizon of the bulk geometry, creating an instability.
It would be interesting to study cosmology on the brane when it is moving in the charged black hole backgrounds that we have constructed.
Note that since these charged holes does not have inner horizon for certain range of parameters, we may generate non-singular cosmology without creating the instabilities that we have just mentioned.
original_annotated_samples:
Though, in this Letter we have constructed the Born–Infeld black holes in the presence of a cosmological constant and
discussed their thermodynamical properties
, many issues however still remain to be investigated.
translated_annotated_samples:
Aunque en esta carta hemos construido los agujeros negros de Born-Infeld en presencia de una constante cosmológica y discutido sus
propiedades termodinámicas
, aún quedan muchos problemas por investigar.
discussed their thermodynamical properti.translated_text:
Aunque en esta carta hemos construido los agujeros negros de Born-Infeld en presencia de una constante cosmológica y discutido sus
propiedades termodinámicas
, aún quedan muchos problemas por investigar. Sabemos que los agujeros negros de Reissner-Nordström AdS experimentan una transición de fase de Hawking-Page. Esta transición se modifica al incluir las correcciones de Born-Infeld. Esperamos llevar a cabo un estudio detallado sobre este tema en el futuro. Además, en el contexto de la cosmología del mundo de branas, se encontró que una brana en movimiento en un fondo de Reissner-Nordström AdS genera una cosmología no singular [14]. Sin embargo, como se muestra en [15], la brana siempre cruza el horizonte interno de la geometría a granel, creando una inestabilidad. Sería interesante estudiar la cosmología en la brana cuando se mueve en los fondos de agujeros negros cargados que hemos construido. Nótese que dado que estos agujeros cargados no tienen horizonte interno para cierto rango de parámetros, podríamos generar una cosmología no singular sin crear las inestabilidades que acabamos de mencionar.

generate non-singular cosmology without.translated_key: generar una cosmología no singular sin crear las inestabilidades

We know that Reissner–Nordström AdS black holes undergo Hawking–Page phase transition.
This transition gets modified as we include Born–Infeld corrections into account.
We hope to carry out a detail study on this issue in the future.
Furthermore, in the context of brane world cosmology, it was found that a brane moving in a Reissner–Nordström AdS background generates non-singular cosmology [14].
However, as shown in [15], the brane always crosses the inner horizon of the bulk geometry, creating an instability.
It would be interesting to study cosmology on the brane when it is moving in the charged black hole backgrounds that we have constructed.

Note that since these charged holes does not have inner horizon for certain range of parameters, we may
generate non-singular cosmology without creating the instabilities
that we have just mentioned.
